metadata.title: Block IP addresses by USername - ForcepointNGFW
metadata.description: This is forcepoint FUID playbook for blocking IP addresses by username ForcepointNGFW.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches a list of potentially suspicious User Accounts that are part of Azure Active Directory (AAD) through Azure Sentinel.
2. If the IP address is not present in the security policy rule then adds to the security policy and closes the incident.
prerequisites: 1. Forcepoint SMC Custom Connector and Forcepoint FUID Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Forcepoint SMC API Key should be known.[Refer here](http://www.websense.com/content/support/library/ngfw/v610/rfrnce/ngfw_6100_ug_smc-api_a_en-us.pdf )
3. Forcepoint SMC Version number should be known. [Refer here](https://help.stonesoft.com/onlinehelp/StoneGate/SMC/)
4. Forcepoint FUID version number should be known.[Refer here](https://www.websense.com/content/support/library/uid/v20/install/fuid_200_ht_integrate-fuid_a_en-us.pdf)
5. Security policy rule name created in SMC should be known.

metadata.description: Enter name for playbook without spaces

Enter the api key for smc login
Enter the version number of SMC
Enter the version number of FUID
Enter smc firewall security policy rule
